title: Leave Busters
body: This is sort of dumb i crash in middle of games and looking for solution as i post this and guess what 5 timers or 20 minutes yeah!!! i mean i did leave a lot of games 2 weeks ago but some i just crash and i get a timer just like now its kind of stupid...

replies.body: An account will receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) after multiple leaves, and not just a single game.  Even if it's not intentional, they still cause other players a negative experience.  If you are still crashing, I'd be happy to help but need more information.  Let me know what you're seeing exactly and when, such as any error messages.  Let me know!
